title: Mint

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may sow a mint plant at a player's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Mint plants take effect the day after they were planted.
- Mints provide Powerful defense against all direct attacks.
- When one of your minted targets is attacked, all mint plants will die and you cannot plant for another night.

fields.name: Notifications:
fields.value:
"You have decided to sow a mint at (player)'s house.
"(player) was saved by a plant. All of your mint plants have died!"
"You must wait a day collecting new seeds."

"You were attacked but a powerful plant saved you!"

desc:
Post 161
*You are an herbal gardener that spreads plants in the village.*
